Export.Routine:
COMClearData #include COMSYS #include WWWConst #include COMConst
ClearData(pintLevel,pblnVerbose=0)
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Method Usage ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Jan-2009 SCR SR690 SR Number here>: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new strStatus,idClass,objClass,intClassType,strGlo,intCount new arrCount,blnIndex
set idClass="" for { set idClass=$order(^WWW001(0,idClass)) quit:idClass="" set objClass=$get(^WWW001(0,idClass,1)) set intClassType=$$$WWW001ClassType(objClass) if intClassType="" { set intClassType=0 }
set blnIndex=$data(@("^"_idClass_"s"))'=0 if pblnVerbose { write !,idClass write " [",$$$WWW001ClassDescription(objClass)_" ] " write " Type:",intClassType write $select(blnIndex:" Index",1:"") } set strGlo="^"_idClass for intCount=0:1 { set strGlo=$query(@strGlo) quit:strGlo="" } if pblnVerbose { write " Data Records ",intCount } if intCount { set arrCount(0,intClassType,idClass)=intCount_" ["_$$$WWW001ClassDescription(objClass)_" ] "_$select(blnIndex:" Index",1:"") } else {
} if intClassType>pintLevel { continue } kill @("^"_idClass) kill @("^"_idClass_"s") } zw arrCount quit
ClearGlobals
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Method Usage ; ; Params: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Jan-2009 SCR SR690 SR Number here>: Created ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
W !,"Cleaning Globals"
SET TTIME=$PIECE($HOROLOG,",",2) SET SHOWTIME=$ZTIME($PIECE($HOROLOG,",",2),1) W !,"START TIME "_SHOWTIME
